mobiles.name: tiger
mobiles.long_description: The tiger is here looking for something to chew on
mobiles.description: The tiger snarls at you,and leaps to attack

mobiles.name: lion
mobiles.long_description: The lion prowls around looking for lunch
mobiles.description: It looks back at you considering whether to eat you

mobiles.name: penguin
mobiles.long_description: The penguin is here looking for fish
mobiles.description: The penguin looks at you expectantly

mobiles.name: monkey
mobiles.long_description: The monkey swings around chattering at you
mobiles.description: The monkey tries to steal some food from you

mobiles.name: armadillo
mobiles.long_description: The armadillo shuffles around looking for food
mobiles.description: Smooth on the inside,crunchy on the outside

mobiles.name: aardvaark
mobiles.long_description: The aardvaark waddles around looking for insects
mobiles.description: You dont think its seen you yet

mobiles.name: head warden
mobiles.long_description: The head warden stands here,really unhappy wiyh the situation
mobiles.description: He shouts"Go on clear off.Before i have security throw you out" at you

mobiles.name: shopkeeper
mobiles.long_description: The shopkeeper stands here looking bored
mobiles.description: She looks you over,considering whether to close for half an hour or so

mobiles.name: seal
mobiles.long_description: The seal is here swimming in its pool
mobiles.description: The seal claps its flippers at you begging for fish

mobiles.name: crocodile
mobiles.long_description: The crocodile is here grinning at you
mobiles.description: You are unnerved by all those teeth.But you wonder why is it crying ?

mobiles.name: shark
mobiles.long_description: The shark is here swimming in its tank
mobiles.description: You stare into its eyes and feel dread as you see nothing there.

mobiles.name: snake
mobiles.long_description: The snake slithers around looking for rodents
mobiles.description: The snake looks back at you and rears to strike

mobiles.name: lizard
mobiles.long_description: The lizard scuttles about
mobiles.description: The lizard looks back at you!

mobiles.name: whale
mobiles.long_description: The whale is here performing tricks
mobiles.description: SPLASH !!!!! You get very wet as it splashes you with smelly water

mobiles.name: canadian
mobiles.long_description: The canadian stands here culling seals
mobiles.description:
He laughs at you for being squeamish !!!
Ha Ha Ha Ha.

mobiles.name: pigeon
mobiles.long_description: The pigeon is here pecking at the ground
mobiles.description: Its runs around your feet,getting in the way

mobiles.name: visitor
mobiles.long_description: The visitor stands here, completely clueless.
mobiles.description: The visitor looks back at you!

mobiles.name: visitor
mobiles.long_description: The visitor stands here gawping at the animals
mobiles.description: She smiles at you.

mobiles.name: caretaker
mobiles.long_description: The caretaker is here, listlessly pushing a brush around
mobiles.description: Eh? whats that sonny?

mobiles.name: security man
mobiles.long_description: The security man stands here looking threatening
mobiles.description:
You feel intimidated by the menacing gleam in his eye!
He senses your fear and turns to stare at you.
Where have you seen that insignia before ??

mobiles.name: security woman
mobiles.long_description: The security woman stands here hoping you'll make trouble
mobiles.description:
She has "HATE" tattoed on both knuckles,which only just clear the floor.
She seems strangly familiar,maybe thats why inbreeding is illegal !?

mobiles.name: seal pup
mobiles.long_description: The baby seal is here looking helpless
mobiles.description:
It looks at you imploringly with big brown tender eyes,
begging you to save it !!!

mobiles.name: bear
mobiles.long_description: The bear is snuffling about looking for honey
mobiles.description:
You have just recieved a Paddington bear hard stare.
You feel very afraid !!!!

mobiles.name: dragon red
mobiles.long_description: The dragon is here basking in the heat
mobiles.description:
The dragon considers eating you now,or eating you later.
It decides now and roars as it attacks!

objects.name: heavy wooden club
objects.description: A bloodstained club is lying here

objects.name: Tiger paw
objects.description: A withered limb lies here forgotten

objects.name: small fish
objects.description: A small red fish is here.It looks suspiciously like a red herring

extra_descr_data.description: Now you examine it more carefully,you can see it is indded a Red Herring

objects.name: clear potion tear crocodile
objects.description: A clear potion is lying here

objects.name: can coke
objects.description: A small red drink can is rolling around here

objects.name: ham sandwich
objects.description: A ham sandwich is here uneaten

objects.name: crisp bag
objects.description: A bag of crisps are here uneaten

objects.name: basket picnic
objects.description: A picnic basket is here unnatended.Better pick it up before the bears get it.

objects.name: bucket metal
objects.description: A bucket lies here smelling of fish

objects.name: fish
objects.description: A nice fresh fish is here

objects.name: souvenir
objects.description: A small platic elephant is lying here

objects.name: souvenir
objects.description: A small plastic elephant is lying here

objects.name: lion skin lionskin cloak
objects.description: A tatty pile of fur is in the corner

objects.name: bearskin skin bear pelt cloak
objects.description: A pile of fur has been carelessly thrown here

objects.name: tigerskin skin tiger cape
objects.description: A mouldy pile of fur is here

objects.name: monkyskin vest skin monkey
objects.description: Another pile of fur is here

objects.name: armadillo breastplate plate
objects.description: A pile of scales are lying here

objects.name: aardvaark scale shield
objects.description: A reptilian scale is lying here forgotten

objects.name: gloves sealskin skin
objects.description: A small pile of fur is here

objects.name: necklace tooth sharktooth
objects.description: A tooth necklace is here

objects.name: wardens hat
objects.description: A blue peaked cap is here

objects.name: nightstick rubber black
objects.description: A black rubber nightstick is here on the floor

objects.name: security cap
objects.description: A black peaked cap is here

objects.name: black security uniform
objects.description: A black uniform is lynig crumpled here

objects.name: heavy automatic pistol
objects.description: A luger 9mm automatic pistol is lying here

objects.name: boots black hobnailed
objects.short_description: a pair of black hobnail boots
objects.description: A heavy pair black hobnailed boots are here

objects.name: shirt checked
objects.description: A checked shirt lies here

objects.name: torch rubber black
objects.description: A black rubber torch is here

objects.name: key steel
objects.description: A steel key is glinting in the dirt

objects.name: brass key small
objects.description: A small brass key is lying in the dirt

objects.name: large ruby
objects.description: A large red gem is here in the dirt

objects.name: litter bin
objects.description: A Zoo litter bin is standing here for your rubbish

objects.name: dragonquest666
objects.description: A Blue Dragonstone lies here gleaming.

rooms.name: Entrance to Midgaard Zoo
rooms.description:
You are standing in the entrance to Midgaard Zoo, the ticket booth is closed,
but the gates have been forced apart a little.

rooms.name: A main junction
rooms.description:
This the main junction of the path network in the Zoo. There is a tall white
sign in front of you. The grass on the side of the path is very long and 
obscures a small sign.

extra_descr_data.description:
north to penguins
south to reptile house and tigers

rooms.name: pathway
rooms.description: The path continues here, weaving its way through the Zoo

rooms.name: Entrance to the reptile house
rooms.description:
You are standing at the entrance to the reptile house. The door is secured 
with a heavy chain which has rusted shut.

rooms.name: The reptile house
rooms.description:
You are standing in the reptile house.all around you are various glass 
fronted chambers. Oh dear! all the glass is broken,then you see the name of 
one the missing exhibits......
BABY RED DRAGON

rooms.name: Pathway
rooms.description:
This is a crossroads in the path network,there is a large white sign in the
middle,standing on a small island. The path to the south is overgrown with 
brambles,but you could get through if you tried.

extra_descr_data.description:
East to reptile house
South to tigers
West to lions

rooms.name: Tiger enclosure
rooms.description:
The tiger enclosure is herenext to the path,the cage seems to be empty, which 
could be explained by the open gate. You had best BEWARE ...........
there are tigers loose somewhere.

rooms.name: Crossroads
rooms.description:
The path has reached a crossroads.The small island in the centre has a spike 
sticking out of it. It looks likes it used to be a Zoo sign post.

rooms.name: Pathway
rooms.description: The path continues south to a small shed,which is marked "HEAD WARDEN".

rooms.name: The shed
rooms.description:
You enter the shed to see a scene of total destruction and mayhem.The floor 
is strewn with paper and rubbish.

rooms.name: Boiler room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the boiler room for the Zoo,a large furnace is here,and 
in the corner you a large pile of coal. From somewhere you hear a reptilian 
hiss.

rooms.name: Pathway
rooms.description:
The path stops at this point,or so it seems.After fighting through the 
brambles you get to a small clearing and see another exit.

rooms.name: Pathway
rooms.description:
The path turns here and follows its own wandering couse through the Zoo to 
the other animals.

rooms.name: Lion pen
rooms.description:
The lions enclosure is a large field stretching as far as the eye can see,
but there are no lions here as the gate is open.

rooms.name: Pathway
rooms.description:
A turn in the path takes you on a wandering journey through the flora and 
fauna.

rooms.name: Pathway
rooms.description:
The path continues straight on. It seems the path has not been looked after 
for some time, since the paving stones are broken and very uneven.
Try not to trip.

rooms.name: penguin enclosue
rooms.description: There are no penguins here. Hmmmm! What is it with this zoo ? All you see are several rotting fishheads.

rooms.name: The seal pool
rooms.description:
This is obviously the seal pool, and there are some here splashing in thier 
pool. But there does seem to be a lot of blood around.

rooms.name: T junction
rooms.description: You have reached a T-junction. There is a large white sign here.

extra_descr_data.description:
North to seals
South to souvenir shop
West to picnic area and monkey house

rooms.name: Souvenir shop
rooms.description:
You are standing the souvenir shop.All sorts of memorabilia can be bought 
here.

rooms.name: Pathway
rooms.description: You are on a pathway leading through the Zoo.

rooms.name: monkey house
rooms.description:
The cage has a large sign on the side telling you of the eating habbits and
places of origin of the monkeys that were supposed to be here. But the door 
is open and you guess that they have escaped.

rooms.name: T junction
rooms.description: You are at yet another T-junction with a large white sign on an island.

extra_descr_data.description:
north to picnic area
East to monkey house
South to Whale arena

rooms.name: Crocodile pool
rooms.description: Yet another empty exhibition area. There are no crocodiles to be seen here.

rooms.name: Shark pool
rooms.description: This is the shark pool. At last there are some sharks swimming here.

rooms.name: Whale arena
rooms.description:
There is a large whale here listfully pushing a ring around. The children 
here watching seem to enjoy it though.

rooms.name: Bear pit
rooms.description:
This is a large pit some 30 yards across. There are some grizzly bears 
here,looking hungry.

rooms.name: Picnic area
rooms.description:
This is a nice peaceful area with wooden tables and benches. Trees provide 
shade from the sun, such a nice place to relax. There is a small sign here.

extra_descr_data.description: Help keep the Zoo tidy.Put your rubbish in the proper place.

resets.comment: the armadillo to Entrance to the reptile house
the seal to The seal pool
the canadian fur trapper to The seal pool
the seal pup to The seal pool
the red dragon to Boiler room
; Entrance to the reptile house Lock East
the security woman to Picnic area
a Zoo litter bin to A main junction
a Zoo litter bin to Crossroads
a Zoo litter bin to Pathway
a Zoo litter bin to T junction
a Zoo litter bin to Picnic area
a picnic basket to Picnic area
